Interface com.chimu.form.mapping.MappedObjectXi

public interface MappedObjectXi
extends MappedObject
This contains extended functionality for mapped domain objects that must be supported to work with the extendedInterface mode of an ObjectMapper. By implementing this interface a DomainObject will be called.

See Also:
setupUseExtendedInterface

Method Index

form_forceIdentityFor(ObjectMapperXi)
Called whenever FORM needs to insert the identity for the specific object.
form_updateAfterIdentityFor(ObjectMapperXi)

Methods

form_forceIdentityFor 
 public abstract boolean form_forceIdentityFor(ObjectMapperXi om)
Called whenever FORM needs to insert the identity for the specific object. This will be followed by a call to #form_updateAfterIdentityFor

This should return true if an identity insert was required

form_updateAfterIdentityFor 
 public abstract void form_updateAfterIdentityFor(ObjectMapperXi om)
